alert.note: Alert for Chattooga; Floyd; Gordon; Walker (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 2:30PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Floyd, southeastern Walker, northwestern Gordon and northeastern Chattooga Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 230 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Lake Marvin, or 8 miles west of Calhoun, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Trion, Subligna, Suttles Mill, Villanow, Sugar Valley, Everett Springs and Lake Marvin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
